text: "Sympathy for the Devil" is a 1968 song by English rock band The Rolling Stones and is the opening track from their studio album Beggars Banquet. == Guns N' Roses version == "Sympathy for the Devil" was covered by Guns N' Roses for the 1994 Neil Jordan movie Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles. It went to number 2 in Denmark, number 5 in Ireland, number 9 in the United Kingdom, number 12 in Australia, number 13 in New Zealand and number 55 in the United States. Category:The Rolling Stones songs Category:1968 songs Category:Guns N' Roses songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Bryan Ferry songs
title: Sympathy for the Devil
